code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{gradientClasses}from'../../constants/constants';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const PoolCard=_ref=>{let{pool,onView,onDelete}=_ref;const gradientIndex=useSelector(state=>state.color.gradientIndex);useEffect(()=>{},[gradientIndex]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-6 mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-bold text-gray-800",children:pool.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-gray-600 mt-2",children:["Status: ",pool.status?'Active':'Inactive']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-gray-600 mt-2",children:["Start Date: ",new Date(pool.startDate).toLocaleDateString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-gray-600 mt-2",children:["End Date: ",new Date(pool.endDate).toLocaleDateString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onView(pool.id),className:`py-2 px-5 border rounded-lg cursor-pointer ${`${gradientClasses[gradientIndex]} text-white`} transition-colors duration-200`,children:"View"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDelete(pool.id),className:`py-2 px-5 border rounded-lg cursor-pointer ${`${gradientClasses[gradientIndex]} text-white`} transition-colors duration-200`,children:"Remove"})]})]});};
